Init-Control-Attachments.description: The received collection of attachments to obtain

Init-Control-Continue.description: Control variable to control continuation within the task following issues

Init-Control-Continue-Step.description: Control variable to control continuation within a step following issues

Init-Control-Error.description: A variable used in throw errors to stop processing

Init-Control-Error-Message.description: A variable used to describe the current problem

Init-Control-Page.description: Control variable to control pagination within an entity download

Init-Control-Since.description: Fundamental control property which controls scope of data delta's received from source

Init-Control-Started.description: Fundamental control property and key to process control

Init-Control-Status.description: The task control status recorded in the database by target APIP calls

Init-SourceOAUTHSecret.description: The source OAUTH Secret or password

Init-TargetOAUTHCredentials.description: The target OAUTH Credentials of id and secret

Set-Parse-Source-OAUTH-Refresh-Fail.description: Throw error because re login parse of data failed

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to parse the source login token.

Set-Re-Authenticate-Source-Attachment-Fa.description: Throw and error because the re login failed with bad http status

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to re-authenticate with the source API for attachments

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to re-authenticate target for attachment

Re-Authenticate-Attachments.description: Re-Authenticate again at start and every x attachments.

Scope-Attachments-Fail-Post-To-Target.description: Throw error to exit scope and fail run - should really check for 401 and attempt re login to target

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to re-authenticate with source API.

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed attempting to obtain attachment data.

Scope-Attachments.description: Obtain all of the attachments on the list and post the data and metadata to the blobs endpoint to store the file and update the database.

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to get the attachments list to download attachment files.

Re-Authenticate-Source.description: Sign in to the source authentication endpoint and get a new token

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to re-authenticate the source endpoint.

Scope-Re-Authenticate.description: This copes with the potential expiration of OAUTH tokens at either end point.

Get-Entity-Page.description: Call the entity endpoint and ask for as much as it will allow

Post-Entity-Page.description: Post the received entities to the target API

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed posting entities (@{items('For-Each-Entity')}) to Target API.

Set-Control-Continue-False.description: As there are no more entity members we stop processing this entity

Set-Control-Entity-Completed-True.description: And ask for the next one

Set-Validate-Get-Entity-Page-Fail.description: Forces an exception in the workflow by calling int() on a string

Set-Validate-Get-Entity-Page-Fail-Contro.description: Get page has failed so stop processing this entity
Move on to next entity to avoid a long-running loop of failures on this entity

Scope-Entities.description: Download all of the entities which we have not yet had changes for.

Record-Control-Status-Report.description: Record the final status that marks this task as completed.

Scope-Report.description: To send notification via email on results of the run.

Set-Control-Since.description: Set the Since date and time according to the returned value of the last successful run

Set-Control-Started.description: Set the started date and time using the returned value to get SQL adjusted milliseconds

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to record the process start

Validate-Scope-Target-OAUTH.description: Check that the status code is correct

Scope-Target-OAUTH.description: Connect up to azure and get a target authorisation token

Record-Control-Status-Attachments.description: This will trigger the extract process inside the database via stored procedures

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to record task progress status to extract.

inputs.name: Control-Error-Message
inputs.value: Failed to record task prgress to Entities
